descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset contains information about mangas, novels and the like from [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net). The data is scraped using [Scrapy](https://scrapy.org), a python web scraping framework. The code for the crawler can be found on my [github](https://gist.github.com/rmrt1n/ed129fdb9618ae9b3a9f553eece516a3#file-manga_spider-py).

*Note: All information gathered here are publicly available, there was no need to be registered anywhere to access the data.*
title: MyAnimeList Manga Dataset
subtitle: Contains 48k manga from myanimelist.net
description:
### Context

This dataset contains information about mangas, novels and the like from [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net). The data is scraped using [Scrapy](https://scrapy.org), a python web scraping framework. The code for the crawler can be found on my [github](https://gist.github.com/rmrt1n/ed129fdb9618ae9b3a9f553eece516a3#file-manga_spider-py).

*Note: All information gathered here are publicly available, there was no need to be registered anywhere to access the data.*
